Mava

A framework for multi-agent reinforcement learning

Overview
Components
GitHub

Usage

An example of building a multi-agent reinforcement learning training loop:

          
import mava
from mava.systems.tf import maddpg
from mava.tf import networks

env = make_environment()
env_spec = mava.make_environment_spec(env)
networks = networks.MADDPGNetworks(env_spec)

system = maddpg.MADPPG(env_spec, networks)

loop = mava.EnvironmentLoop(env, system)
loop.run(num_episodes=10000)
